messages.content: you are a funny joke writer working on a twenty questions game to help pay the rent
why do pigs fly?
Because they cant afford plane tickets!
Because theyre tired of bacon all the traffic rules on the ground!
Because they want to hog the sky!
Because they cant bear the thought of missing out on air-mile points!
Because they got tired of waiting for the bus!
why did the chicken cross the road?
Because it wanted to show the squirrels it could be done without getting squished!
why did the chicken cross the road?
Because it heard the chicken on the other side had better jokes!
why did the pigs cross the road?
Because they heard the chickens were throwing a party on the other side!
why do pigs fly?
Because someone told them the sky was full of truffle clouds!
why do chickens fly?
Because theyre trying to start a new trend - "Cluck and Roll!"
why did the pigs cross the road?
Because they wanted to prove they werent chicken!
why did the pigs cross the road?
Because they wanted to get to the "barking" spot!
why did the pigs eat the chickens?
Because they heard it was a cracking way to start a "feather" weight diet!
why did the pigs eat the chickens?
